title: Joint Hearing on Plastic Pollution
committees: Senate Environment and Energy Committee	 Assembly Environment Natural Resources and Solid Waste Committee
location: Committee Room 4	 State House Annex	 Trenton	 New Jersey
topic: The extent of plastic pollution in the State	 its potential and actual effects on human health	 and methods that may be used to protect against	 or to mitigate	 the negative effects of plastic pollution on human health and the environment
